summary: This is a Federal Bureau of Prisons transfer receipt for Jeffrey Epstein from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 9, 2019. It documents his transfer status and includes his registration number and other identifiers.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The document is a transfer receipt for Epstein, listing his registration number and indicating his status for transfer from MCC New York.

events.title: Epstein Transfer Receipt Issued
events.description: A transfer receipt was issued for Jeffrey Epstein from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, documenting his status for transfer.

locations: MCC New York, 150 Park Row, New York, NY, 10007
keyFacts: The document is a Bureau of Prisons transfer receipt for Jeffrey Epstein dated August 9, 2019.
Epstein's registration number is listed as 50501-054.
The receipt originated from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York City.
The document indicates Epstein was in custody and being processed for transfer.
The form includes various identifiers and codes related to his incarceration and transfer status.
